QWER

Introduction

Magenta is a South Korean bassist under 3Y CORPORATION and Tamago Production. She is best known as the bassist of the project girl band QWER.

On July 2, 2023, Magenta was confirmed as a member of the upcoming female band QWER. She made her debut with the band on October 18, 2023, with the release of their debut single album, "Harmony from Discord".
